商品名稱: TUNEVUSE 男士花卉正裝襯衫長袖休閒鈕扣花朵印花襯衫 100% 純棉
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: 黑色
留言內容: I couldn’t find any women’s shirts in cotton that were fun, so I tried this. Works great. (Men’s S for 125 lb, 5’6”, busty). A tailored women’s shirt would be better, of course,  but this looks nice. Fits great. Very comfortable. Real cotton (I hate most synthetics; they get smelly and hot). Relatively thin (but not too thin or cheap) cotton. Nice spring or summer shirt. I don’t put nicer clothes in the dryer, so I don’t know about shrinkage. Washing machine in laundry bag was fine.

商品名稱: TUNEVUSE 男士花卉正裝襯衫長袖休閒鈕扣花朵印花襯衫 100% 純棉
留言內容:
無法載入媒體。
                



It is a slim-fit dress shirt, and fits my slimmer body frame/build perfectly. Overall Graphic Quality was very nice, intricately detailed, and consistent throughout the entirety of, as well as every viewing angle of, the Shirt. On another note, the fabric also  seems to be of decent-to-above-par quality. Not nothing too crazy-  but not cheap, poorly sewn,  ripped , or easily threading apart fabric as I’ve often came across in the past when purchasing cheaper fake, or faux, “Designer” or “Designer Style Influenced” dress shirts. The only real complaint I would even remotely have, was I had ordered a blue floral, which in retrospect is still very nice and I am indeed quite happy I purchased, but I did note that the online picture; made the blue in the background behind the floral print, appear to be more of a sky-blue shade. Apon arrival, I noticed that the background hue, was leaning alot more towards a dark/navy blue side of the color spectrum. Aside from that, I still love the shirt and have received many compliments. Would definitely recommend! I plan to order many more in some of the other offered styles. They appear to have a very wide variety of selection; different prints, hues,  patterns, etc.

留言內容: Might be a great shirt.This review is for the customer service and not the shirt. I was never able to wear the shirt.I ordered two shirts, different styles.The material is great, the weight is perfect, and it seems to be stitched together very nicely. It is a great looking shirt, and I would love to wear it.But… They sent me the wrong size. I ordered  XXL and they sent me an XL. Both shirts were in bags marks XXL, but both shirts were XL. At 6‘5“ and 250 pounds, I need me an XXL. If the shirts fit, they would have been awesome. I was ordering them for a special occasion, and there is no way I will get a replacement before then. I am very disappointed.

留言內容: I really like the fabric which is undoubtedly 100% cotton. For me, I always love extremely soft cotton shirts because I live in a warm, tropical region. But in actual sense, it's usually produced for summer casual outing but it doesn't restrict the use to that time of the year. Because I'm 5ft 9 the length is ok but I'm a slim guy and it's slightly big from chest down ro the waist, but someone trimmed it a bit for me.Overall, it has a good paisley design and nice fabric.
